overview: Jass, a detective-mother who is engulfed in grief when she loses her eight-year-old child in a mob attack. Struggling to come to terms with the loss, she shifts to High Wycombe, and is soon tasked with the investigation of a 10-year-old child’s murder case. As she delves deeper into the investigation, she finds herself going down a rabbit hole of secrets, where almost everyone in the small town becomes a suspect. She has to not only process her grief, but also overcome her pre-conceived notions of right and wrong as she tries to find the truth in this murder mystery.
title: The Buckingham Murders
